div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1061 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1949 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 50 AE. In ancient pit in agora Olbia: 25 fish-shaped AE 21 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 6 [1], 8 [2], 13 [4], 14 [1], 23 [13]) Panticapaeum: 1AE (as Minns, pl. 5, 19) Unc.: 3 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
